TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you need to say that in wish format.

I wish for starship to be finished.

Granted.  Starship announces their retirement, making them finished.

I wish I was fluent in every known language in the Universe.

Granted. The Universe speaks Ithkuil, and you should study it.

I wish I didn't misthread my posts.

Granted. You mispost the thread. 

I wish I could use Nuclear Thermal Rocket in real life(With proper cooling and infinite fuel)

Granted. You are a janitor in the Space Nuclear Wastes Junkyard.

I wish the electrons were 0.512 MeV heavy.

Granted: Everything implodes.

I wish everybody is empathetic.

Granted. Everybody is emm... pathetic.

I wish there was a bridge from Australia to Antarctics to let the kangaroo and the penguins visit each other.
There would be pengaroo and canguins.

Upd.
Also it would make Antarctics warm again, and the Australian deserts watered.
 

Edited October 15, 2022 by kerbiloid

(multipost)

Edited October 15, 2022 by kerbiloid

Granted. But the bridge can only carry 1g so it's pointless. Besides, building it will make the ice in Antarctic melt. 

I wish for a better computer.

Granted. You hired a guy with abacus to compute for you.

I wish the rockets were squared.

Granted. You get this model rocket kit. 

I wish for a glider rocket kit.

Granted: It has 20,000 parts and an Allen Key is provided to help with assembly.

I wish to know the ultimate answer.

You need to wait for 10000000yrs because you don't hav the Deepthought. 

I wish for a corrupted wish. 

Edited October 17, 2022 by Abel Military Services

Granted. Wish + Bribe = Corrupted Wish

I wish for better libcurl examples.

Granted: Elizabeth (known to her friends as Lib) gives you tutorials on different ways to curl eye lashes.

 

I wish that Hydrogen economy was well established.

Edited October 18, 2022 by ColdJ

Granted. The woodcutters are providing the coalers with enough wood to make enough charcoal to produce enough hydrogen for their director's son toy car.

I wish there was a planet consisting of thorium in the Solar System..

Granted. It pseudo-orbits earth. It's also made of thorium-219, with a half-life of like a few microseconds. It starts a chain reaction which causes it to detonate with the force of thousands of Tsar Bomba's, irradiating most of the earth.

 

I wish that all roofs suddenly and spontaneously teleported up 1m.

Granted. The Earth has coincidentally passed 1 m while they were teleporting, so the roofs stay where they were.

I wish the true Dark Phoenix (aka Famke Janssen) had defeated her opponents and the pseudo-Dark Phoenix never happened.

Granted. The whole stuff disappeared. Now you can only watch a 4242 years old man playing KSP. 

I wish for a Hitchhiker's guide to the Galaxy sequel.

Granted: You get the entire book series and enjoy it immensely. The downside is the movie never seems as funny as it used to.

I wish this actually happens.

Granted the only thing you can do now is it and say "THis"

I wish for all my mods to work on ksp2

Granted. All your favourite mods will work, however your FPS will drop from 60 to 1

I wish for more things to do Kerbin Side

Granted. Kerbin is now flat and double-sided. You can do twice as much.

1 hour ago, Rutabaga22 said:

I wish for all my mods to work on ksp2

It's OK. The mods keep modding the KSP-2 forum as well.

***

I wish Android had dll libraries.

Granted. Microsoft purchased Android and it's now MicrosoftOS

I wish I have a Kerbal space fleet

Granted. Now you have two half-sized killers from Fleet Street.

Spoiler


I wish IMAP and POP3 protocols were the same.
